WorkItem.Description:
Per: http://elitistjerks.com/f78/t105429-cataclysm_mechanics_testing/
Trinkets that proc duration buffs have been tested to always follow the rule of thumb: 5x the buff duration = ICD.
Â 
Key to the Endless Chamber...Left Eye...etc.  Many of these have been tested and verified.  Barring other evidence I suspect this is what Rawr should default to when importing procs.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Several trinkets proc ICD needs to be adjusted

Comments.Message:
Ones identified as in need of fixing...

38. Left Eye of Rajh has a 30% proc rate and a 50 second ICD 
39. Key to the Endless Chamber has a 10% proc rate and a 75 sec ICD.
40. Essence of the Cyclone has a 10% proc rate and a 50 second ICD. 
41. Unheeded Warning has a 10% proc rate and a 50 second ICD. 
42. Prestor's Talisman of Machination has a 10% proc rate and a 75 second ICD. 
43. Grace of the Herald has a 10% proc rate and a 100 second ICD. 
48. Swordguard Embroidery has a 15% proc rate and a 55 second ICD.
